# requiresFelicaSecureElement

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the payment pass requires the Felica Secure Element.

## Declaration

```swift
var requiresFelicaSecureElement: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property can be used as a filter to determine which cards are shown in the [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKAddPaymentPassViewController] class’s intro screen. The property defaults to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Filtering pass libraries

- **paymentNetwork**: The payment network.
- **primaryAccountIdentifier**: A primary account identifier, used to filter out pass libraries.
